message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $15,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its market value. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
